text: hi this is Christine Kahlo of girl
traveler so here I am to review the

themselves they design clothing that act
as moveable sakes but keep your

safe from pickpocketing and B the
clothing takes the place of storing your
valuables in a money belt or a hotel
safe earlier this year I reviewed the
clever tropic companion tank top I don't
use it only for traveling I use it
actually when I'm home so it's come in
handy it's very versatile and I love it
it's one of my favorite travel pieces
and it's the lighter first up is a
clever travel companion t-shirt the
pockets are very sturdy and well built
they are double stitched and nothing is
going to fall out of anything I am
hoping that they come out with cuter
designs for the t-shirts though
I've been curious about the clever
travel companion underwear the underwear
is adorable
it's definitely snug form-fitting and
comfortable one thing I found out with
pockets was that it fits the size of my
passport almost exactly my hands just a
little bigger than my passport there are
times that I can get a little frustrated
with that far as the shorts go I'm not a
huge fan of having my pockets on the
front of me because I just added 48
pages into my passport book it's like a
little chunky monkey that's going into
my front pocket making it a little hard
for me to sit down but I found out that
I can wear my underwear backwards so
that my pockets will face the back makes
it a whole lot easier
they're a little thicker than my normal
underwear so I've kind of been using
them as yoga shorts 2x Christie Talib
